Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Failed to mount component: template or render function not defined in circular references between components" (#6991) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
Hi,

I encountered an issue in circular references between components, and i have tried the way your team offered in docs(**_in parent component uses beforeCreate lifecycle hook to register the child component_**), but it still has the same error: `Failed to mount component: template or render function not defined`, could some one offers some help here?
Thank you so much!

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Unused paramater : getter" (#1039) at vuejs/vuex
Events.RelatedBody: In the current getter example, there is no need of including `getters` dependency as we are not using it while defining the method to search by Id, `getTodoById`

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "shopping-cart example: 'lastCheckout' should be 'checkoutStatus' to have any impact" (#1036) at vuejs/vuex
Events.RelatedBody:
inside [types.ADD_TO_CART] ...

    state.lastCheckout = null // seems to do nothing
    state.checkoutStatus = null // this makes more sense, hides checkout-msg when new item gets added to cart
